description: Describes the beckn message packet context

action.description: Defines the Beckn API call. Any actions other than the ennumerated actions are not supported by Beckn Protocol

core_version.description: Version of Beckn core API specification being used

domain_version.description: Version of Beckn domain level schema being used

bap_id.description: ID of the BAP in the network

bg_id.description: ID of the BG in the network

bpp_id.description: ID of the BPP in the network

bap_nw_address.description: Address of the BAP in the network

bg_nw_address.description: Address of the BG in the network

bpp_nw_address.description: Address of the BPP in the network

request_transaction_id.description: BAP generated transaction ID.This is a UUID which is used for mapping requests to callbacks.

token.description: The network access token obtained from the tokenization service to authenticate the BAP. This will be a simple JWT used when tokenization services are supported by the beckn network. The payload of the JWT token will contain the context object. The signature of the JWT is the signature of the tokenization service which can be verified using the public key of the tokenization service
